class XmlExample
{
	public /*DOMDocument*/ function getData()
	{
	    $xmlDocument = new DOMDocument();
		$xmlDocument->load(WebOrbServicesPath."Weborb".DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR."Examples".DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR."xmlData.xml");

		return $xmlDocument;
	}
}
?>
